summary: Mobile action RPG 'Realm of Legends' with character customization, open world exploration, real-time combat, quests, multiplayer features, crafting system, and free-to-play monetization
architectural_notes: Mobile platform targeting iOS and Android
Action RPG genre with real-time combat mechanics
Target audience: ages 12+, casual to hardcore gamers
Fantasy setting with magic, mythical creatures, and ancient prophecies
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Fantasy forest environment background with mystical trees and glowing flora (forest-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Mountain landscape background with snow-capped peaks and dramatic sky (mountain-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Dark dungeon interior background with torches and stone walls (dungeon-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Medieval fantasy city background with towers and marketplaces (city-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Human character race illustration showing typical features (race-human.dim_400x400.png)
- Elf character race illustration with pointed ears and elegant features (race-elf.dim_400x400.png)
- Dwarf character race illustration with stocky build and beard (race-dwarf.dim_400x400.png)

- Mage class icon with staff and magical aura (class-mage.dim_256x256.png)
- Ranger class icon with bow and arrow (class-ranger.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create 3D open world environment using React Three Fiber with diverse biomes (forest, mountain, dungeon, city) that players can explore
Implement dynamic day-night cycle system that transitions between time periods and affects world lighting
Create dynamic weather system with multiple weather states (clear, rain, storm) that change environmental visuals and affect gameplay
Build real-time combat system with keyboard/touch controls for movement, basic attacks, and ability execution
Implement choice-driven dialogue system where player decisions affect story outcomes, NPC relationships, and world state
Build resource gathering system where players can collect materials from the environment (ore, herbs, wood) during exploration
Build in-app store for cosmetic items, battle passes, and premium membership with secure purchase flow

Design a fantasy RPG visual theme with medieval-inspired UI, mystical color palette (emerald greens, deep purples, gold accents), ornate borders, and atmospheric typography that evokes magic and adventure

new_feature_requests.summary: Character creation with race (Human, Elf, Dwarf) and class (Warrior, Mage, Ranger) selection plus appearance/skills customization
Open world with diverse environments (forests, mountains, dungeons, cities) and dynamic weather/day-night cycle
Real-time combat system with combos, special abilities, and ultimate skills
Main storyline with side quests and player choices that impact world and NPC relationships
Cooperative multiplayer mode for boss battles and guild system with trading and guild wars
Resource gathering, crafting system for weapons/armor/potions, and player-driven economy with trading
Free-to-play monetization with in-app purchases for cosmetics, battle passes, and premium membership
Seasonal events, daily rewards, and in-app challenges for player engagement
Create character creation system with race selection (Human, Elf, Dwarf) and class selection (Warrior, Mage, Ranger) with distinct visual representations and stat modifiers
Implement character appearance customization interface with options for physical features, hair, skin tone, and equipment appearance
Build skill tree and ability system where players can allocate skill points and unlock class-specific abilities
Implement combo attack system where sequential attacks trigger special combo moves with enhanced effects
Create special ability system with cooldown timers where players can activate class-specific abilities during combat
Implement ultimate skill system with charge meter that fills through combat actions and unleashes powerful class-specific attacks
Create main storyline quest system with sequential chapters, quest tracking, objectives, and completion rewards
Build side quest system with optional missions that provide exploration incentives and additional rewards
Create cooperative multiplayer mode where players can form parties to battle boss enemies together
Build guild system where players can create or join guilds, view member lists, and access guild chat
Implement player-to-player trading system within guilds where members can exchange items and resources
Create guild wars feature where guilds can challenge each other in competitive battles for rewards and rankings
Create crafting system where players can combine resources to create weapons, armor, and potions using recipes
Implement player-driven marketplace where users can list items for sale, browse listings, and purchase from other players
Create seasonal event system that activates limited-time quests, challenges, and exclusive rewards on a schedule
Implement daily rewards system that grants players bonuses for logging in each day with streak tracking
Create in-app challenge system with rotating daily and weekly challenges that reward players for completing specific objectives
Render all generated images (fantasy environment backgrounds, character race illustrations, class icons, UI decorative elements) as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
